Hello again

slight mistake in my last message, the line

'iges-g -o picture.o picture.igs'  <------------taken from manuel previously mentioned

was meant to read

'iges-g -o picture.g picture.igs'  <------------taken from manuel previously mentioned

thanks again

Chris
